function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unintended adverse effects of covid-19 containment measures on mental and physical health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social isolation and lockdown affecting mental health with symptoms of post-traumatic stress, fear, anxiety, and depression.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate open green spaces for outdoor recreation and exercise in some cities.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and air circulation in limited-sized domestic spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of implementing vertical gardens in housing levels","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climatic impact on balcony design","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close physical interaction with live plants in home gardening may facilitate the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased physical interaction with outdoor spaces such as balconies may contribute to the spread of airborne diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of climatic conditions in balcony design may lead to indoor environmental conditions that are conducive to disease transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases from close physical interaction with live plants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to noise pollution impacting mental health","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Noise pollution in residential clusters due to urban design and building configurations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of acoustic privacy in courtyard houses due to inadequate design","category":"Privacy-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate arrangement of balconies in relation to noise sources , highways","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Highrise apartment buildings increase contact with shared surfaces and hinder access to fresh air and nature.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Migration away from crowded cities leads to changes in the form and type of housing, potentially impacting disease spread in new areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased horizontal expansion leading to movement into detached houses and closed apartment complexes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contentment and sense of security in gated communities during the pandemic","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative consequences of lockdown policies on crowded residential areas and multi-generational families","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases such as covid due to home overcrowding","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental illnesses associated with overcrowding, such as anxiety, distress, depression, and social isolation","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of additional space for quarantine room and attached bathroom for infected persons","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited balcony space leading to overcrowding and lack of distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate work-from-home spaces leading to reduced productivity and comfort","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate workspace dimensions and ergonomic design can lead to physical discomfort and health issues for remote workers.","category":"Health-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate home entry area design may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases by failing to provide effective decontamination and hygiene measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and lighting in home workspaces may lead to poor indoor air quality and discomfort for remote workers.","category":"Health-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of spatial organization in the home may lead to increased risk of disease transmission between different activities and areas within the home.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate handling and delivery system for goods and services may lead to potential exposure to contaminants during the transfer of items into the home.","category":"Health-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited space and lack of dedicated entry zones for managing outdoor to indoor transitions may lead to an increased risk of bringing contaminants into the home.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment due to open floor plans and lack of privacy","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for adaptive furnishing in open-plan layouts","category":"Health-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of noise transmission in open-plan layouts","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial organization leading to congestion and limited separation between activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient modular system leading to inadequate adaptation of spaces for multiple functions","category":"Health-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for acoustic factors leading to noise interference between spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of movable walls and adjustable open plans may increase the risk of airborne disease transmission within the home.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The aeroponic system on the balcony introduces a potential risk of contamination or spread of plant-borne diseases within the home.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shared living spaces increase the risk of contagious disease transmission, especially during an epidemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on automation and smart home technology may lead to increased sedentary behavior and decreased physical activity, impacting overall health and immunity.","category":"Health-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of aeroponic systems for food production within the living environment may introduce new health risks and potential contamination.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on home automation and smart homes may lead to a higher risk of exposure to contagious diseases within the household.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Flourishing information and communication technology ict , internet of things iot , and artificial intelligence ai in smart homes may create vulnerabilities for cyber-attacks and data breaches, posing a risk to personal and healthcare information security.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased sales and adoption of iot devices and smart home systems may result in environmental impacts from electronic waste and energy consumption.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smart home devices for health monitoring can lead to privacy concerns and data security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to electromagnetic waves from 5g technology may have potential health risks.","category":"Health-related risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive study of smart home technologies and their social implications may result in unforeseen societal challenges.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased time spent cooking and eating at home leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases in the kitchen","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fomite transmission of covid-19 through contaminated surfaces in households","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of the coronavirus on various household surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
